column5: I was looking at odd'ball jigs they looked neat but wasn't sure if they would work or not. Has anyone tried these>? 1 months n 2 days tell I will be fishing on Lac seul

Yes.I've even caught quite a few fish on them.They wok well with a minnow or a leech. I use a grub body with no tail. They are good for "draggin a jig" type presentantions, as well as normal casts and vertical jigging.
